name: 2X Towers Puzzle
description:
A Puzzle game has a set of objects(disks) and 2 boards with pegs.

The game has Goal and Start positions.

After the game has started, the player must match Start and Goal positions.

The player can put an object on any free peg [ free zone-markers( Z1, Z2, Z3) ].

If the zone is not free, bigger objects can't go on top of the smaller objects.

After the game start: Clicking on the Zone-Marker will lift up the object. (all in the same column if rules will let it happen)

Another click on the Zone-Marker will put the object down. (all in the same column if rules will let it happen) Use ENTER to restart the current room. To restart the current room use the right button mouse click. You may use the ARROWs key(Upp, Down) to switch between screen modes. To Save/Load game(room) use F5/F8 . To Save the game(room) use the middle button mouse click. In the SavedGamesRoom or SolvedGamesRoom click on the bars to load the game. To delete games use the CLEAR button, after this click on bars to delete games. If You solve the game, this game will be saved in SolvedGamesRoom. F1=HELP
